title: Bill Paxton’s family files wrongful death suit

og.title: Bill Paxton's family files wrongful death suit | CNN
og.description: The family of Bill Paxton believes his death last year was preventable, according to a wrongful death lawsuit filed by the family against the hospital and surgeon who treated the late actor.
